page.title: 17 Playground Games (3)
page.content: (Continued from Page 16) Another popular game with the girls is Â£Queenio,Shinio,Polish' A ball is thrown and all the children run after it.Whoever gets it first holds it behind her back.The rest line up alongside her and pretend also to be hiding the ball.They all shout Â£Queenio,Shinio,Polish'.The person who threw the ball in the first place tries to guess who has the ball.When a name is called the person has to show her hands.If she has the ball she then throws up the ball and the game starts over again.If the caller wishes she can shout Â£Dustbins' and all the children Have to turn roun once with their arms folded to give the caller a better chance.If the caller chooses the wrong person then she is out.Although there are games such as Hopscotch marked on the plaground they are rarely used
